description: This file is a CLI script for a project initializer tool in Python. It handles command-line argument parsing, configuration creation, project initialization, and output formatting. It orchestrates the process of generating project templates based on user input.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Holds initialization information for project templates, including commands, environment configs, init files, and scripts.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Repository for project configuration parameters such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and additional parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration or class representing different supported project types with a method to parse from string.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Handles the overall process of creating project templates, initializing based on configurations, and returning success status.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary with proper data types.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path into an absolute path based on a given base path.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary with absolute paths for init files for JSON serialization.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Formats and prints the JSON output indicating success or failure, along with messages and template info.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main entry point that sets up argument parsing, creates configurations, runs project initialization, and outputs results.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
